name: Corona Run (NiMBLe Interactive)
description:
DOWNLOAD MAC VERSION THROUGH ITCH.IO/APP

In a coronavirus-infected world, going out for a jog is not as simple as it normally would be. You must be vigilant as you navigate the city streets, minding cars, people, obstacles on the sidewalks, and the coronavirus alike. Hold your breath to protect yourself from the virus- but be  conservative as you can only hold it for so long! Jump over fire hydrants and garbage cans, and weave in between cars and people as you speed through the streets. Good luck!
